text: these beautiful photos of the sky were created by stacking images of the same scene together using a time-lapse method . photographer matt molloy snapped a range of scenes including sunsets and bright skies in at midday . mr molloy , of ontario , canada , said : ` sunsets seem to work well , as the lighting constantly gets darker . a midday time-lapse can get messy , but they can be fun too . ' he added : ` i 'm a big fan of experimenting . much like this process , you never know what you 're going to get .
